episodes.title: Autism & Cults #podcast #autism #autismawareness #NeuroDives
episodes.description:
Debunking the Myth: Autism and Cults

Description:

Is there a link between autism and cults? Discover the truth behind this harmful stereotype and learn why it's important to challenge misconceptions about autism.

In this informative video, we'll explore:

The factors that contribute to cult susceptibility
The importance of support and understanding for individuals with autism
How to avoid falling victim to harmful stereotypes
Join us in promoting inclusivity and challenging harmful misconceptions about autism.

#autismawareness #CheapABA #NeuroDives #autism #cults #neurodiversity #mentalhealth #awareness
